description.zh_cn: 水印内容通过函数的返回值自定义，默认：用户名
description.en_us: The watermark content is customized by the return value of the function. The default value is user name

metadata.defaultValue: function(options) { var store = require("erdcloud.store"); var user = store.state.app.user; options.content = user.displayName;}
metadata.classification: 功能类配置(通过开关开启或关闭相应功能)

name.zh_cn: 页面水印样式参数配置

description.zh_cn: 参数格式为json格式,或一个函数返回一个json格式
description.en_us: The parameter format is json, or a function returns a json format

metadata.classification: 功能类配置(通过开关开启或关闭相应功能)

description.zh_cn: 登出前的拦截，可以做一些自己的处理
description.en_us: Intercept before logout, you can do some of your own processing

description.zh_cn: 设置小部件的顺序，支持数组和方法
description.en_us: Sets the order of widgets, supports arrays and methods

description.zh_cn: 用户第一次进入系统默认的布局
description.en_us: Default layout when user enters the system for the first time

description.zh_cn: 用户第一次进入系统默认的主题
description.en_us: Default theme when user enters the system for the first time

description.zh_cn: 布局和应用的适配关系
description.en_us: The fit between layout and application

description.en_us: The fit between theme and application
